mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM') = MAX(SUBSTR(DOC_NO, 1, 4)) THEN REPLACE((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')|| TO_CHAR((SUBSTR(MAX(DOC_NO),5,3)+1),'000')),' ','') ELSE REPLACE((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')|| '001'),' ','') END AS DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_APRV_INFO ( DOC_NO, USER_ID, DOC_TYPE, PRESERVE_YEAR, DOC_CLASS, DOC_STATUS, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{docNo}, #{userId}, #{docType}, #{preserveYear}, #{docClass}, '02', #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
INSERT INTO TB_APRV_LINE ( DOC_NO, APRV_SEQ, USER_ID, APRV_TYPE, APRV_STATUS, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{docNo}, #{aprvSeq}, #{userId}, '01', '02', SYSDATE, #{regUserId} )
INSERT INTO TB_APRV_FILE ( DOC_NO, FILE_SEQ, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #{docNo}, #{fileSeq}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE, #{regUserId}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.DOC_TYPE, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' AND A.DOC_TYPE=COM_CD ) DOC_TYPE_NAME, A.DOC_NO, A.TITLE, A.DOC_STATUS, C.DEPT_NAME, B.USER_NAME, A.REG_DT FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, TB_USER_INFO B, TB_DEPT_INFO C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD

SELECT E.COM_NAME, E.TITLE, E.USER_NAME, E.REG_DT, E.DEPT_NAME, E.DOC_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) RN, D.COM_NAME, A.TITLE, B.USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO )B, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )C, ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD, COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE )D WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND A.DOC_TYPE = D.COM_CD AND D.COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' )E WHERE RN > (#{currentPage}-1)*#{countPerPage} AND RN <= #{currentPage}*#{countPerPage}

SELECT F.DOC_NO, F.COM_NAME, F.TITLE, F.USER_NAME, F.REG_DT, F.DEPT_NAME, F.DOC_STATUS FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) RN, A.DOC_NO, D.COM_NAME, A.TITLE, B.USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO )B, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )C, ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD, COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE )D, ( SELECT USER_ID, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_LINE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )E WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND A.DOC_TYPE = D.COM_CD AND D.COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' AND A.DOC_NO = E.DOC_NO AND A.DOC_STATUS = '02' )F WHERE RN > (#{currentPage}-1)*#{countPerPage} AND RN <= #{currentPage}*#{countPerPage}

SELECT F.DOC_NO, F.COM_NAME, F.TITLE, F.USER_NAME, F.REG_DT, F.DEPT_NAME, F.DOC_STATUS FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) RN, A.DOC_NO, D.COM_NAME, A.TITLE, B.USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER_INFO )B, ( SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NAME FROM TB_DEPT_INFO )C, ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD, COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE )D, ( SELECT USER_ID, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_LINE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )E WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND A.DOC_TYPE = D.COM_CD AND D.COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' AND A.DOC_NO = E.DOC_NO AND A.DOC_STATUS IN('03' , '04') )F WHERE RN > (#{currentPage}-1)*#{countPerPage} AND RN <= #{currentPage}*#{countPerPage}

SELECT A.DOC_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, B.USER_NAME, A.DOC_TYPE, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP01' AND A.DOC_TYPE=COM_CD ) DOC_TYPE_NAME, A.DOC_CLASS, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP03' AND A.DOC_CLASS=COM_CD ) DOC_CLASS_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DT, C.DEPT_NAME, A.PRESERVE_YEAR, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP02' AND A.PRESERVE_YEAR=COM_CD ) PRESERVE_YEAR_NAME, A.DOC_STATUS, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP04' AND A.DOC_STATUS=COM_CD ) DOC_STATUS_NAME FROM TB_APRV_INFO A, TB_USER_INFO B, TB_DEPT_INFO C WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD

SELECT A.USER_ID, B.USER_NAME, B.POSITION_CD, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'US01' AND B.POSITION_CD = COM_CD ) POSITION_CD_NAME, C.DEPT_NAME, A.APRV_TYPE, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP03' AND A.APRV_TYPE=COM_CD ) APRV_TYPE_NAME, A.APRV_STATUS, ( SELECT COM_NAME FROM TB_COM_CODE WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'AP06' AND A.APRV_STATUS=COM_CD ) APRV_STATUS_NAME FROM TB_APRV_LINE A, TB_USER_INFO B, TB_DEPT_INFO C WHERE A.DOC_NO = #{docNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD ORDER BY APRV_SEQ
SELECT FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE FROM TB_APRV_FILE WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APRV_LINE A, ( SELECT DOC_STATUS, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_INFO WHERE DOC_STATUS = '02' )B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_APRV_LINE A, ( SELECT DOC_STATUS, DOC_NO FROM TB_APRV_INFO WHERE DOC_STATUS = '03' )B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO
